events.name: Let's develop for Android
events.description: Android Training is a 4-day training session on Android programming. For the first time, Bukavu programmers will receive basic and advanced knowledge that will enable them to develop high-quality mobile applications.

events.name: DevFest Eastern DRC 2017
events.description:
DevFest is an awesome event created for students, developers, aspiring entrepreneurs interested in Google Technologies and how they could use this to build their products, using this to build better solutions for our community and the society.

We want the Eastern DevFest in DRC, to be a catalyst for change exposing developers to technology, letting them create networks in order to increase greater app quality in the region and learn how to use technology in business. Also we hope to lets developers and entrepreneurs to meet news google technologies and Meet wonderful people who can help develop the technological sphere in the region.

GDG DevFest 2017 is our annual all-day developer conference that offers speaker sessions across multiple product areas, codelabs, hackathon and more!

AGENDA

DAY 1

‚úì¬† Attendees Registration

‚úì¬† Key Note

‚úì¬† Firebase session (Speaker)

‚úì¬† Web development season(Speaker)

‚úì¬† Break time/lunch

‚úì¬† Mobile development and content distribution

‚úì¬† Kotlin ‚Äì develop mobile apps

‚úì¬† Ending notes

DAY 2

‚úì¬† Android things season (Speaker)

‚úì¬† Codelabs/Hackathon(Theme presentation & beginning)

‚úì¬† Break time/lunch

‚úì¬† Google Cloud Platform

‚úì¬† Codelabs/Hackathon (Continuous)

‚úì¬† Winners announcement (Speaker)

‚úì¬† End Notes and Finalizing event.

events.name: Cloud Study Jam Goma

venue.name: ISIG (Institut Superieur d'Informatique et de Gestion)
venue.address_1: ISIG (Institut Superieur d'Informatique et de Gestion)

events.description:
Vous souhaitez vous lancer sur Google Cloud, mais vous ne savez pas par o√π commencer? Rejoignez-nous pour notre Cloud Study Jam!

B√©n√©ficiez gratuitement d'une formation de Google, d'une valeur de 55 $ et plus. Ensemble, nous travaillerons dans plusieurs laboratoires Google Cloud. Vous obtiendrez une exp√©rience pratique de la console cloud, de Kubernetes, de la s√©curit√©, de l'IoT sur le cloud et de l'apprentissage automatique.

Apr√®s notre session en direct, vous aurez un acc√®s gratuit √† davantage de laboratoires que vous pourrez terminer chez vous. Terminez tous les laboratoires de la qu√™te et obtenez un badge h√©berg√© par Google pour votre profil en ligne, ainsi que 30 jours suppl√©mentaires d'acc√®s √† la plate-forme de formation pour concurrencer les laboratoires de votre choix.

Apportez un ordinateur portable et un chargeur (PC, Mac ou Chromebook)! Les travaux pratiques s‚Äôappliqueront √† toutes les derni√®res versions des navigateurs populaires. Pour une exp√©rience optimale, assurez-vous que Firefox ou Chrome est install√© sur votre ordinateur portable. N'oubliez pas votre chargeur.

events.name: Google I/O Extended 2019 Goma

venue.name: ISIG (Institut Superieur d'Informatique et de Gestion)
venue.address_1: ISIG (Institut Superieur d'Informatique et de Gestion)

events.description:
GDG Goma will host a Google I/O Extended at ISIG where you can join us comfortably to watch the Google I/O 2019 keynote live and all others sessions on Kotlin, Flutter, Firebase and IA. After that, we will have a moment to discuss all the news and announcements made by Google.

I/O brings together developers from around the globe for talks, hands-on learning with Google experts, and a first look at Google‚Äôs latest developer products.

events.name: DevFest19 Goma
events.description:
Already missing #devfestGoma?üòä

It is official! GDG DevFest Goma 2019 is going to take place on October 26th.

GDG DevFest 2019 is our annual all-day developer conference that offers speaker sessions across multiple product areas, codelabs, hackathon and more!

GDG DevFest Goma this year brings together people who are shaping the future of Android, Web, IoT - Robotics, AI and Cloud technologies for 1 days of sessions, workshops and networking.

GDG DevFest Goma is a 100% community organized conference with
200+ amazing engineers (embarking on a nomadic journey from all corners of the continent/world), carefully selected tech talks, the best industry experts presenting on the exciting topics and a world-class conference experience.

events.name: Flutter Interact: Viewing Party

venue.name: ISIG (Institut Superieur d'Informatique et de Gestion)
venue.address_1: ISIG (Institut Superieur d'Informatique et de Gestion)

events.description:
This yea Google is hosting a major event, Flutter Interact, on Dec 11, 2019, to announce new features associated with Flutter and other related Google technologies.

A global and one of the major events by Google for Flutter this year.
There is going to be new announcements, feature updates associated with Flutter and other Google technologies! Sounds fun, right?
Along with that we‚Äôll be hosting a codelab on Flutter and will show how to get started building your own flutter apps.
We invite explorers, developers and students to join and celebrate this great year full of your experiences, experiments and explorations.

Register yourself by filling up this form and wait till we send out invites
